Title: Pearls Of Great Value
Description:
When Amirdrassil's roots spread to the water, many rare creatures arose from the ocean's depths and now flourish around the dreams.

One such rare creature is the Sandsparkle Clam, which can contain magical pearls!

See if you can locate these clams and find some pearls within.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Deliver the supplies to Magnolia in Valdrakken.

Objectives.Text: Complete the events of "Enter the Dream"
